item.title: As a dev, you should know ops
item.description: This is a repost of a blog from one of our Founders: https://dev.to/canelasevero/as-a-dev-you-should-know-ops-3bkh/edit Cause DevOps . . . … Some would say that you should learn it simply because you should, end of story.
